Posts.Content: Hi, I wrote in a bit ago about my mom, 54 (whom I adore) was diagnosed with stage 4 met. to the liver, she has 14 tumors in her liver...she has had 2 doses of chemo, her tumor markers went from 152 down to 59...That sounded AWESOME to me...but the nurse said..."yeah that is pretty good?!!?!" Is this Really good, or just ok?? I don't trust them...And what exactly does this mean?? I thought it meant that the tumors were shrinking, to me that is a huge improvement... I want to find The VERY BEST clinic for her to get a second opinion, We live in Oregon..I have heard that MD anderson is good, does anyone have any info on an AWESOME place for my Awesome mom...Cancer sucks!!!!Thanks for being here.. Leah
Posts.Title: Looking For The Best Doctor For Stage 4 Met to Liver, Tumor Markers??....

Posts.Content: Hi, My name is leah my mom who is 54 was just diagnosed with stage 4 met. breast to the liver...she is on chemo every 3 weeks..does she honestly have only have that long??? they said 5 years..were they saying only a 5% chance of 5 years??
Posts.Title: Stage 4

Posts.Content: My mom has stage 4 mets to liver, she has 14 lesions(sp? 330 am lol) in her liver, they did NO surgery she just gets chemo every 3 weeks...That frustrated both of us...I am not sure...Let me know what the onc. says...Keep Strong!!! I will be praying for you...Leah
Posts.Title: Her-2 With Mets to Liver

Posts.Content: Hi, My name is Leah my mom was diagnosed with stage 4 breast cancer to the liver...They are not doing any surgery on her now. She is going in for her second chemo on Thurs. I know how you feel, like in a cloud, not earing, sleeping, and SAD, my heart actually hurts. How old is your sister? Is she married? kids? and what did they tell her EXACTLY?? They told my mom she had about 5 years..(that killed me) We are VERY close..I have 2 kids That ADORE her...I would REALLY get to know exactly what is going on..I am still working on my mom's info...I am wanting to get another opinion..maybe at OHSU (we live in Oregon) or in Texas they have MD Anderson cancer clinic that I have heard is wonderful!!!!! Just be there for her and listen, I can't imagine being in there shoes, we have to PRAY, and just be there. email me directly if you ever want to talk...I have good days, and bad, (this is a good one lol) Take care, what is her name I will pray for her...Have a good day, chin up!! Leah
Posts.Title: Bone and Breast Cancer
